New Records: Shreyas Iyer scored 128 runs off 94 balls in the match
India used nine bowlers in the innings, a rare occurrence in World Cup matches
Key Match Events: India's use of nine bowlers was a key strategic move
The dismissal of Teja Nidamanuru by Rohit Sharma in the final over was a turning point
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized focusing one game at a time and adapting to different venues
Netherlands captain Scott Edwards discussed their confidence in their style and young side
Post-Match Reflections: Shreyas Iyer reflected on his performance and the team's adaptability
Rohit Sharma highlighted the team's clinical performance and adaptability
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's ninth consecutive win in World Cup matches was a historical achievement
